      • addSubscribe

        public void addSubscribe(String name,
                         String type)
        Add a subscriber. Note: right now this just adds to the message sent onopen; in the future, could be something like name, type, default, callback
        Parameters:
        {String} - name of route
        {String} - type of route ("range", "boolean", or "string")

      • addSubscribe

        public void addSubscribe(String name,
                         String type,
                         String methodName)
        Add a subscriber + a specific callback for this route. Note: routes with a specific callback don't call the default methods (e.g. onRangeMessage, etc)
        Parameters:
        {String} - name of route
        {String} - name of method
        {String} - type of route ("range", "boolean", or "string")
